Description_lang: The Guardian decimates its primary target, inflicting $355352s1 Physical damage and an additional $355357s1 Arcane damage split evenly among all players within $355357a1 yards of the primary target.In addition, all targets hit by the effect take $358619s1% increased damage from $@spellname355352 and suffer $358622s1 Arcane damage every $358619t2 sec for $358619d.
